name: Sam Peak
description:
Embark on a fast-paced adventure where sam, our protagonist, heads towards the mountain where things are lost. In this microMetroidVania you will unlock new when abilities you acquire enough money with the misions. 

Controls:

Move: ASDW or arrow keys

Attack: Q

Jump: Space bar

Made in 3 days for the Weekly Game Jam - Week 146 game jam. The theme was 

Mountain Climber.
